quote: Develop the strength to do bold things, not the strength to suffer.
Give a man the ability to achieve, and he will probably crawl over broken glass with a smile.
You're built for adventure.
The importance of smaller steps.
You can choose to suffer the pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
Failure hurts once, wisdom is forever.
And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who couldn't hear the music.
author: Nietzsche

quote: Act as if.
True hell is when the person you are meets the person you could have been.
Step by step, furiously.
We do not act rightly because we have virtue, but we have virtue because we have acted rightly.
You don’t have to do anything right now.
You do not see the world as it is, but as you are.
Don’t trust a spiritual leader who can’t dance.
Don’t be so busy making a living you forget to make a life.
Veni, vidi, vici.
You’re either playing to win or playing not to lose.
Find joy in the journey.
You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Happiness is the moment right before you need more happiness.
If no good reason to say no, say yes.
The greatest ship in the world is useless if the captain doesn’t know where he’s going.
You allow things.
If you only do what you have to do, you’ll always have to do what you're told.
If you only do what you're paid for, you're getting paid the right amount.
It’s only embarrassing if you let it be.
Misery loves company.
Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
Hate always comes from beneath. Nobody gets jealous of losers.
Where awareness goes, attention follows. Attention influences thoughts. Thoughts influence actions.
Your meaning in life is proportionate to the amount of responsibility you take on.
Desire implies it’s possible to achieve.
Imagine what you could achieve if you lived your life as if anything was possible.
Better competent than protected.
Self-care is what you withdraw when life knocks you down.
If you waste 4 hours a day, that’s 1,400 hours a year — or 35 workweeks.
It doesn’t need to be perfect. It just needs to be done.
Time is the one thing you really can’t get back.
The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself.
author: Jordan Belfort

quote: The voyage of discovery is not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Make more mistakes than others make attempts.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Everyone thinks they're the hero of their own story — even the villains.
Self-respect is the fruit of discipline.
There’s only one way to guarantee you won’t make it: not trying at all.
Every man has two lives. The second starts when he realizes he has just one.
Things don’t get better unless you try to make them better.
You can be the juiciest peach, and someone still won’t like peaches.
Being bad at something is the first step to being sorta good at something.
God put the best things in life on the other side of terror.
So be afraid — then do it anyway.
Denial is subconscious — otherwise it wouldn’t work.
Trail mix is just M&Ms with obstacles.
If global warming isn’t real, why did Club Penguin shut down?
Someday isn’t a day of the week.
No one ever changed the world by doing what the world told them to do.
Ask not for a lighter burden but for stronger shoulders.
The mind is a powerful servant but a terrible master.
It’s funny how day-to-day nothing changes, but when you look back, everything has.
Don’t cling to a mistake just because you spent a long time making it.
If time is money, why do people spend money just to waste time?
Tradition is not the worship of ashes, but the preservation of fire.
Relentlessly resourceful.
We are the new adults.
Follow your dreams. Stop listening to people who don’t.
Conventional wisdom gets you conventional results.
Bad decisions make good stories.
It is that simple.
What is good? All that heightens power in man. What is bad? All that proceeds from weakness.
author: Nietzsche

quote: One must have chaos within oneself to give birth to a dancing star.
author: Nietzsche

quote: No one can build you the bridge across your own life — only you can cross it.
author: Nietzsche

quote: Can’t stop the spirits when they need you. This life is more than just a read-through.
author: Red Hot Chili Peppers

quote: Stay far from timid. Only make moves when your heart’s in it. And live the phrase 'sky’s the limit.'
author: Notorious B.I.G.

quote: If the devil wants to dance with you, say never — a dance with the devil might last forever.
author: Immortal Technique

quote: Try your best. Try everything you can. Don’t worry what their bitter hearts say.
author: Jimmy Eat World

quote: Yeah, it’s overwhelming, but what else can we do? Get jobs and offices and morning commutes?
author: MGMT

quote: Didn’t make sense not to live for fun. Your brain gets smart, but your head gets dumb.
author: Smash Mouth

quote: What you know about doing five beats a day for three summers?
author: Kanye West

quote: You can have what you want. Be what you want.
Easier to cope with a bad conscience than a bad reputation.
The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
We shall defend our island, whatever the cost may be.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: O God, that I were a man! I would eat his heart in the marketplace.
author: Shakespeare
